mapper.insert: insert into t_screening_report (report_id, screening_id, screening_type, pdf_url, image_url, cut_image_url, report_json, edit_status, nursing_advice, data_json, print_time, report_dt, abnormal_sign, abnormal_level, abnormal_msg, member_id, doctor_id ,result_status ,valid) values (#{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screeningId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screeningType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{pdfUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cutImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{nursingAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{reportDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{abnormalSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abnormalLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abnormalMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ,#{resultStatus} ,#{valid})
mapper.update:
update t_screening_report
pdf_url = #{pdfUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_json = #{reportJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_status = #{editStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
nursing_advice = #{nursingAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_json = #{dataJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
print_time = #{printTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_dt = #{reportDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
abnormal_sign = #{abnormalSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
abnormal_level = #{abnormalLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
abnormal_msg = #{abnormalMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cut_image_url = #{cutImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid = #{valid},
result_status = #{resultStatus},
where report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select report_id, screening_id, screening_type, pdf_url, image_url, cut_image_url, report_json, edit_status, nursing_advice, data_json, print_time, insert_dt, update_dt, report_dt, abnormal_sign, abnormal_level, abnormal_msg, member_id, doctor_id from t_screening_report where valid = 1 and screening_id = #{screeningId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
